channel.title: Tag on Junlog
channel.description: Recent content in Tag on Junlog

item.description: Context-free grammar CFG : defined with a set of production rules ex) E -> E + E E -> E * E E -> id E -> num CFG : Derivation ex) E ⇒ E + E ⇒ id + E ⇒ id + num we will use ⇒* to denote arbitrary number of rewriting steps CFG : Terminal Symbol : can’t be rewritten anymore (+, *, id, num) CFG : Non-Terminal Symbol : can be rewritten (E)
